entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
